name: Mini Stitch Witch Hat
description: Get ready for spooky season with these adorable amigurumi witch hats! Whether you use them as a simple Halloween decoration or a fun fall-themed gift, these hats are the perfect quick project for an autumn afternoon.
full_text: Get ready for spooky season with these adorable amigurumi witch hats! Whether you use them as a simple Halloween decoration or a fun fall-themed gift, these hats are the perfect quick project for an autumn afternoon. For this pattern, any worsted weight yarn will do. Scraps from your stash work well! SIZE Approx. 6 cm (2.4 in) tall; diameter of brim is 8.5 cm (3.3 in). MATERIALS & TOOLS Worsted weight yarn of your choice in 2 colours Polyester toy stuffing One pair of US 4/3.5mm knitting needles Tapestry needle DIFFICULTY LEVEL Beginner KNITTING TECHNIQUES USED + ABBREVIATIONS K – knit k2tog – knit 2 together kfb – knit front and back CO – cast on BO – bind off st(s) – stitch(es) Happy Knitting!
